exceptions.tactic: intros state R tr1 tr2 H1 H2.

ctx: intros state' R tr1 tr2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment state : Type state' : state -> MetaState state -> Prop R, tr1 : trace state tr2 : is_fin_stream R H1 : sound_trace state' (stream_app R tr1) H2 : nat The term "H1" has type "sound_trace state' (stream_app R tr1)" while it is expected to have type "is_fin_stream ?tr1".

original: intros state R tr1 tr2 H1 H2. apply (trace_app_sequential2 _ _ H1 H2).
